title: Power Projects
homePageDescription: End-to-end high-voltage and extra high-voltage power solutions, including cabling, substations, testing, and system upgrades.

title: Turbomachinery Services
homePageDescription: Maintenance, overhaul, and performance enhancement services for gas and steam turbines and associated equipment.

title: SCADA & Automation
homePageDescription: Design and integration of SCADA and automation systems for real-time monitoring and efficient power network control.

title: Testing & Diagnostic
homePageDescription: Advanced testing and diagnostic solutions to ensure safety, reliability, and performance of electrical assets.

title: Equipment Supply
homePageDescription: Reliable supply of critical electrical equipment and spare parts to ensure uninterrupted industrial operations.
